input.query: Pricebook2Id in (#{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_variable","line":"7d156183","path":["PriceBookId"]}')}) and Product2Id in( #{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_variable","line":"7d156183","path":["productid"]}')}) and currencyIsocode in (#{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_variable","line":"7d156183","path":["currencyisocode"]}')})

input.sql:
select distinct
oli.Quantity,
oli.LineDescription,
oli.OppNumber,
oli.ListPrice,
oli.EctualStartdate,
oli.ActualEndDate,
oli.SourceRecordId,
oli.EntitleToAccount,
oli.EntitleToContactFirstName,
oli.EntitleToContactLastname,
oli.EntitleToContactEmail,
oli.CurrencyISOCode,
opp.id,
pbe.id,
product.id,
product.ProductCode

from #{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_smart_list","line":"43c58c8e","path":["list_name"]}')} as oli
left join #{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_smart_list","line":"bc0ab2c4","path":["list_name"]}')} as opp on 
oli.OppNumber = opp.OpportunityNumber__c

left join #{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_smart_list","line":"107a5315","path":["list_name"]}')} as product 
on oli.ProductCode = product.ProductCode

left join #{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_smart_list","line":"8bee97b0","path":["list_name"]}')} as pbe
on oli.CurrencyISOCode = pbe.CurrencyIsoCode
and opp.Pricebook2Id = pbe.Pricebook2Id
and product.ProductCode = pbe.ProductCode
